definition: to make a copy/to plagiarize/to search and seize/to raid/to grab/to go off with/to take a shortcut/to make a turning move/to fold one's arms

sentences.english: I made/had him copy the lesson 20 times.
sentences.chinese: 我叫他把這篇課文抄寫20遍。

sentences.english: It includes full Flexible Grid and cluster capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 內含完整的叢集和抄寫功能。

sentences.english: Their first form was very often a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 它們最初都只是抄寫的手稿。

sentences.english: Might I your scribe and your confessor be.
sentences.chinese: 我可以你和你的懺悔神父是抄寫員。

sentences.english: We copy sentences from the text.
sentences.chinese: 我們抄寫課文裏的句子。

sentences.english: A. Listen to the tape, read P61(words) to your partner and write these words twice.
sentences.chinese: 聽錄音，朗讀P61單詞給搭檔聽，並抄寫兩次。

sentences.english: On the web, you can learn how to transcribe at various online schools.
sentences.chinese: 在網上，您可以瞭解如何在各種在線抄寫學校。

sentences.english: Transcription errors are of decisive importance in stemmatics.
sentences.chinese: 抄寫錯誤在校定學中具有決定性的重要性。

sentences.english: You sort out these sentences, then copy them, taking care with capital letters.
sentences.chinese: 你把這些句子分類抄寫，注意一下首個字母大寫。

sentences.english: It goes without saying therefore what it means.
sentences.chinese: 抄寫過程中也不需要解釋聖經的意思。

sentences.english: These books were collated and recopied by hand according to a special form.
sentences.chinese: 經過整理後，按特定格式重新抄寫。

sentences.english: Data about trades is written down by scribes and transported by couriers.
sentences.chinese: 交易數據由抄寫員記錄，並交予快遞員傳送。

sentences.english: Read the words and copy them on P18.
sentences.chinese: 熟讀並抄寫第18頁的單詞。

sentences.english: Fill the blanks in there sentences, then write them neatly.
sentences.chinese: 給些句子填空，然後工整地抄寫下來。

definition: to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
